text: This is a list of Belgian television related events from 1983. ==Events== *19 March - Pas de Deux are selected to represent Belgium at the 1983 Eurovision Song Contest with their song "Rendez-vous". They are selected to be the twenty-eighth Belgian Eurovision entry during Eurosong held at the Amerikaans Theater in Brussels. ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ===1980s=== *Tik Tak (1981-1991) ==Ending this year== ==Births== *10 January - Hein Blondeel, actor *26 August - Pim Symoens, singer & TV host *17 September - Erika Van Tielen, TV host ==Deaths==
title: 1983 in Belgian television
